title: Data Binding in ASP .NET 4.6.1
eventShortDescription:
​Do you want to connect people to your data? You will learn how to unleash the data binding potential of ASP.NET 4.6.1 to assist you in creating powerful data-driven websites in a snap. You will discover how to utilize the newest ASP.NET 4.6.1 data-bound controls to give your users a rich and responsive web experience. You will also see how the improved caching works.

Are you ready to be connected? Let us show you how!​
